result.eng: Can you take a message?

result.ponchtml: An féidir leat teaċtaireaċt a ġlacaḋCan you take a message?

result.eng: Do you take sugar?
result.ga: An gcaitheann tú siúcra
result.orig: An gcaitheann tú siúcra
result.html: An gcaitheann tú siúcraDo you take sugar?
result.ponchtml: An gcaiṫeann tú siúcraDo you take sugar?

result.eng: Take off your coat.
result.ga: Bain díot do chóta
result.orig: Bain díot do chóta
result.html: Bain díot do chótaTake off your coat.
result.ponchtml: Bain díot do ċótaTake off your coat.

result.eng: She threatened to take us to court.
result.ga: Bhagair sí an dlí orainn
result.orig: Bhagair sí an dlí orainn
result.html: Bhagair sí an dlí orainnShe threatened to take us to court.
result.ponchtml: Ḃagair sí an dlí orainnShe threatened to take us to court.

result.eng: They would take revenge on landlords who were cruel.
result.ga: Bhainidís díoltas amach ar úinéirí talún a bhí cruálach
result.orig: Bhainidís díoltas amach ar úinéirí talún a bhí cruálach
result.html: Bhainidís díoltas amach ar úinéirí talún a bhí cruálachThey would take revenge on landlords who were cruel.
result.ponchtml: Ḃainidís díoltas amaċ ar úinéirí talún a ḃí cruálaċThey would take revenge on landlords who were cruel.

result.eng: He was ready to take revenge for the death of his father.
result.ga: Bhí sé réidh le díoltas a bhaint amach as bás a athar
result.orig: Bhí sé réidh le díoltas a bhaint amach as bás a athar
result.html: Bhí sé réidh le díoltas a bhaint amach as bás a atharHe was ready to take revenge for the death of his father.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé réiḋ le díoltas a ḃaint amaċ as bás a aṫarHe was ready to take revenge for the death of his father.

result.eng: We need to take a chance and try it.
result.ga: Caithfidh muid dul sa seans agus triail a bhaint as
result.orig: Caithfidh muid dul sa seans agus triail a bhaint as
result.html: Caithfidh muid dul sa seans agus triail a bhaint asWe need to take a chance and try it.
result.ponchtml: Caiṫfiḋ muid dul sa seans agus triail a ḃaint asWe need to take a chance and try it.

result.eng: How long will it take them?
result.ga: Cá fhad a thógfaidh sé orthu
result.orig: Cá fhad a thógfaidh sé orthu
result.html: Cá fhad a thógfaidh sé orthuHow long will it take them?
result.ponchtml: Cá ḟad a ṫógfaiḋ sé orṫuHow long will it take them?

result.eng: People who take my loyalty for granted.
result.ga: Daoine a dhéanann talamh slán de mo dhílseacht
result.orig: Daoine a dhéanann talamh slán de mo dhílseacht
result.html: Daoine a dhéanann talamh slán de mo dhílseachtPeople who take my loyalty for granted.
result.ponchtml: Daoine a ḋéanann talaṁ slán de mo ḋílseaċtPeople who take my loyalty for granted.

result.eng: He would do anything to take revenge.
result.ga: Dhéanfadh sé rud ar bith chun díoltas a bhaint amach
result.orig: Dhéanfadh sé rud ar bith chun díoltas a bhaint amach
result.html: Dhéanfadh sé rud ar bith chun díoltas a bhaint amachHe would do anything to take revenge.
result.ponchtml: Ḋéanfaḋ sé rud ar biṫ ċun díoltas a ḃaint amaċHe would do anything to take revenge.

result.eng: He would do anything to take revenge on him because he had killed his father.
result.ga: Dhéanfadh sé aon rud chun díoltas a bhaint as toisc gur mharaigh sé a athair
result.orig: Dhéanfadh sé aon rud chun díoltas a bhaint as toisc gur mharaigh sé a athair
result.html: Dhéanfadh sé aon rud chun díoltas a bhaint as toisc gur mharaigh sé a athairHe would do anything to take revenge on him because he had killed his father.
result.ponchtml: Ḋéanfaḋ sé aon rud ċun díoltas a ḃaint as toisc gur ṁaraiġ sé a aṫairHe would do anything to take revenge on him because he had killed his father.

result.eng: Take my advice and beware of this man!
result.ga: Glacaigí mo chomhairle agus bígí san airdeall ar an duine seo
result.orig: Glacaigí mo chomhairle agus bígí san airdeall ar an duine seo
result.html: Glacaigí mo chomhairle agus bígí san airdeall ar an duine seoTake my advice and beware of this man!
result.ponchtml: Glacaigí mo ċoṁairle agus bígí san airdeall ar an duine seoTake my advice and beware of this man!

result.eng: The work will take six months.
result.ga: Glacfaidh an obair sé mhí
result.orig: Glacfaidh an obair sé mhí
result.html: Glacfaidh an obair sé mhíThe work will take six months.
result.ponchtml: Glacfaiḋ an obair sé ṁíThe work will take six months.

result.eng: It will take at least six years.
result.ga: Glacfaidh sé sé bliana ar a laghad
result.orig: Glacfaidh sé sé bliana ar a laghad
result.html: Glacfaidh sé sé bliana ar a laghadIt will take at least six years.
result.ponchtml: Glacfaiḋ sé sé bliana ar a laġadIt will take at least six years.

result.eng: It will take another four years.
result.ga: Glacfaidh sé ceithre bliana eile
result.orig: Glacfaidh sé ceithre bliana eile
result.html: Glacfaidh sé ceithre bliana eileIt will take another four years.
result.ponchtml: Glacfaiḋ sé ceiṫre bliana eileIt will take another four years.

result.eng: Do not take it for granted that she will come.
result.ga: Ná déan talamh slán de go dtiocfaidh sí
result.orig: Ná déan talamh slán de go dtiocfaidh sí
result.html: Ná déan talamh slán de go dtiocfaidh síDo not take it for granted that she will come.
result.ponchtml: Ná déan talaṁ slán de go dtiocfaiḋ síDo not take it for granted that she will come.

result.eng: She didn't take anything for granted.
result.ga: Ní dhearna sí talamh slán de rud ar bith
result.orig: Ní dhearna sí talamh slán de rud ar bith
result.html: Ní dhearna sí talamh slán de rud ar bithShe didn't take anything for granted.
result.ponchtml: Ní ḋearna sí talaṁ slán de rud ar biṫShe didn't take anything for granted.

result.eng: All they wanted was to take revenge.
result.ga: Ní raibh ar a intinn ach díoltas a bhaint amach
result.orig: Ní raibh ar a intinn ach díoltas a bhaint amach
result.html: Ní raibh ar a intinn ach díoltas a bhaint amachAll they wanted was to take revenge.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ ar a intinn aċ díoltas a ḃaint amaċAll they wanted was to take revenge.

result.eng: A pencil is not allowed, except to take notes.
result.ga: Níl cead pinn luaidhe a úsáid ach amháin chun nótaí a thógáil
result.orig: Níl cead pinn luaidhe a úsáid ach amháin chun nótaí a thógáil

result.eng: All they want is to take revenge on their old enemies.
result.ga: Níl uathu ach díoltas a bhaint amach ar a gcuid sean-naimhde

result.ponchtml: Níl uaṫu aċ díoltas a ḃaint amaċ ar a gcuid sean-naiṁdeAll they want is to take revenge on their old enemies.

result.eng: Thousands of people come year after year to take part in the festival.

result.eng: He wouldn't take his head out of the drink. He wouldn't stop drinking.
result.ga: Ní raibh a cheann le tógáil aige as ólachán
result.orig: Ní raibh a cheann le tógáil aige as ólachán
result.html: Ní raibh a cheann le tógáil aige as ólachánHe wouldn't take his head out of the drink. He wouldn't stop drinking.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ a ċeann le tógáil aige as ólaċánHe wouldn't take his head out of the drink. He wouldn't stop drinking.

result.eng: He was undecided whether he should take the prisoner with him or let him go.
result.ga: Bhí sé eadar dhá chómhairle cé acu a bhéarfadh sé leis an príosúnach nó a ligfeadh sé a cheann leis
result.orig: Bhí sé eadar dhá chómhairle cé acu a bhéarfadh sé leis an príosúnach nó a ligfeadh sé a cheann leis
result.html: Bhí sé eadar dhá chómhairle cé acu a bhéarfadh sé leis an príosúnach nó a ligfeadh sé a cheann leisHe was undecided whether he should take the prisoner with him or let him go.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé eadar ḋá ċóṁairle cé acu a ḃéarfaḋ sé leis an príosúnaċ nó a ligfeaḋ sé a ċeann leisHe was undecided whether he should take the prisoner with him or let him go.
